entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023
